install: tmpdir=$(mktemp -d) && cp /code/package.json "$tmpdir"/ && [ ! -f /code/package-lock.json ] || cp /code/package-lock.json "$tmpdir"/ && cd "$tmpdir" && npm install --omit=dev && mkdir -p /node_modules && cp -R node_modules/. /node_modules/ && rm -rf "$tmpdir"
about: AssistOS Explorer agent running the official MCP filesystem server over HTTP.
